## Usage Examples

### Basic Installation

Install the chart with default values:

```bash
helm install {release-name} ./charts/{chart-name} -n {namespace}
```

### Custom Configuration

Install with custom values:

```bash
helm install {release-name} ./charts/{chart-name} -n {namespace} \
  --set {key.parameter}={value} \
  --set {another.parameter}={value}
```

### Verify Installation

Check that all resources are created:

```bash
kubectl get all -n {namespace} -l app.kubernetes.io/instance={release-name}
```

<!-- Add specific verification steps for this chart -->
```bash
# Example: Check operator is running
kubectl get deployment {deployment-name} -n {namespace}

# Example: Verify CRDs are installed
kubectl get crd {custom-resource-name}
```

### Debugging

Check operator logs:
```bash
kubectl logs -n {namespace} deployment/{deployment-name} -f
```

Check custom resource status:
```bash
kubectl describe {crd-name} {resource-name} -n {namespace}
```
